meta.title: Mohammed Boussardi | Oracle APEX & Fintech Developer
meta.description: Software Developer specializing in Oracle APEX, PL/SQL, Python, C++, Java, JavaScript, and automation using UiPath. Expert in fintech systems and online programming tutor.

hero.title: Mohammed Boussardi
hero.subtitle: Automation & Fintech Developer
hero.description: Specializing in Oracle APEX, PL/SQL, Python, and automation solutions for fintech systems.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a passionate software developer with over 5 years of experience in creating efficient automation solutions and robust fintech applications. My expertise spans Oracle APEX, PL/SQL, Python, C++, Java, and JavaScript.
about.paragraph2: Beyond development, I'm dedicated to sharing knowledge as an online programming tutor, helping others master the technologies I'm passionate about. My teaching approach combines practical experience with clear explanations to make complex concepts accessible.
about.paragraph3: I believe in creating software that not only meets technical requirements but also delivers exceptional user experiences. Whether I'm building a financial system, automating processes with UiPath, or teaching programming fundamentals, I bring creativity, precision, and a problem-solving mindset to everything I do.
